)

  numbered = FALSE,
  animation = "semi-fade-out"
)

```{r table, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
# See more on tables at https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/kableExtra/vignettes/awesome_table_in_html.html
table <- diamonds |>
  dplyr::slice_head(n = 10)

table |>
  kableExtra::kbl(format = "html", digits = 2, align = "lllcrrrrrr") |>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"),
    full_width = FALSE,
    font_size = 12,
    position = "center"
  ) |>
  kableExtra::column_spec(
    7, color = "white",
    background = kableExtra::spec_color(table$price, end = 0.7),
    popover = base::paste("price:", table$cut)
  )
```

```{r diagram, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(DiagrammeR)
# See https://rich-iannone.github.io/DiagrammeR/graphviz_and_mermaid.html
diagram <- DiagrammeR::create_graph() |>
  
  DiagrammeR::add_node(label = "Cause", node_aes = DiagrammeR::node_aes(shape = "rectangle", color = "black", fontcolor = "white", fillcolor = "grey20", fontsize = 12, x = 0, y = 0, penwidth = 1, width = 1.5, height = 0.5)) |> #1
  
  DiagrammeR::add_node(label = "Mediator", node_aes = DiagrammeR::node_aes(shape = "rectangle", color = "black", fontcolor = "white", fillcolor = "grey20", fontsize = 12, x = 2, y = 0, penwidth = 1, width = 1.5, height = 0.5)) |> #2
  
  DiagrammeR::add_node(node_aes = node_aes(shape = "rectangle", color = "black", fontcolor = "black", fillcolor = "black", fontsize = 0, x = 3, y = 0, penwidth = 0, width = 0, height = 0)) |>
  
  DiagrammeR::add_node(label = "Consequence", node_aes = DiagrammeR::node_aes(shape = "rectangle", color = "black", fontcolor = "white", fillcolor = "grey20", fontsize = 12, x = 4, y = 0, penwidth = 1, width = 1.5, height = 0.5)) |> #3
  
  DiagrammeR::add_node(label = "Moderator", node_aes = DiagrammeR::node_aes(shape = "rectangle", color = "black", fontcolor = "white", fillcolor = "grey20", fontsize = 12, x = 3, y = 1, penwidth = 1, width = 1.5, height = 0.5)) |> #4
  
  DiagrammeR::add_edge(from = 1, to = 2, edge_aes = DiagrammeR::edge_aes(style = "solid", color = "black", fontcolor = "black", fontsize = 10, penwidth = 2, arrowhead = "normal")) |>
  
  DiagrammeR::add_edge(from = 2, to = 3, edge_aes = DiagrammeR::edge_aes(style = "solid", color = "black", fontcolor = "black", fontsize = 10, penwidth = 2, arrowhead = "none")) |>
  
  DiagrammeR::add_edge(from = 3, to = 4, edge_aes = DiagrammeR::edge_aes(style = "solid", color = "black", fontcolor = "black", fontsize = 10, penwidth = 2, arrowhead = "normal")) |>
  
  DiagrammeR::add_edge(from = 5, to = 3, edge_aes = DiagrammeR::edge_aes(style = "solid", color = "black", fontcolor = "black", fontsize = 10, penwidth = 2, arrowhead = "normal"))

DiagrammeR::render_graph(diagram)
```
